pages.text: While somewhat noxious, this fungi is safe to handle freely.$(br2)Not commonly found in this world any more, it can be recreated by bringing forth the wild magic within certain ingredients in the heat of a $(l:crafting/pyres)pyre$().$(br2)It is a $(l:herbs/baffle_cap#renew)renewable resource$(), and finds many uses in offensive spells and rituals.

pages.title: Renewability
pages.text: Unlike other renewable herbs, baffle cap cannot be planted simply as a crop. There are thus two methods that can be used to obtain more of it.$(br2)The first involves planting in a dim area or on a suitable surface, as you would with any other mushroom, and allowing it to spread.$(br2)$(info) This process can be accelerated with the $(l:spells/spell_growth_infusion)Growth Infusion$() spell.

The second method involves bone meal or equivalent fertilizer (alternately applying the 'Embiggening' modifier to the $(l:spells/spell_growth_infusion)Growth Infusion$() spell).$(br2)Applying the bone meal has a chance to grow the baffle cap into a large variant of itself, and breaking these blocks has a chance to yield more mushrooms.
